what: Some notes for adjusting various components
title: Development
text: able adjust yml variables controlling styles. listed bslib/_variables.scss. potentially useful resources: tidyverse template hubStyle template rOpenSci template, especially footer.

title: Development
text: test features using repository, typically install package first rebuilding site locally. iterate: devtools::install() pkgdown::build_site()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Daniel J. McDonald. Author, maintainer. Delphi Research Group. Copyright holder, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: McDonald D (2024). delphidocs: pkgdown template Delphi. R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/cmu-delphi/delphidocs.
code: @Manual{,   title = {delphidocs: pkgdown template for Delphi},   author = {Daniel J. McDonald},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://github.com/cmu-delphi/delphidocs}, }

title: pkgdown template for Delphi
text: delphidocs provides custom pkgdown template Delphi packages. Please don’t use package, feel free modify purposes. Inspired rotemplate.

title: pkgdown template for Delphi
text: probably shouldn’t install package. ’s just template.

title: pkgdown template for Delphi
text: use delphidocs template pkgdown site, add following _pkgdown.yml file: also need add following DESCRIPTION file:

title: Some useful colours — colours
text: useful colours

title: Some useful colours — colours
text: object class character length 11.

title: Consult the Pythia — consult_oracle
text: Need help? Ask oracle.

title: Consult the Pythia — consult_oracle
text: query something like know

title: Consult the Pythia — consult_oracle
text: random response oracle

title: Consult the Pythia — consult_oracle
code: consult_oracle(12345L) #>  #> ── The oracle says:  ── #>  #> ❓ You may rely on it. #>  consult_oracle("A") #>  #> ── The oracle says:  ── #>  #> ❓ Outlook not so good. #>
